transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have wheels and drive on the road.
🚦 Mommies and Daddies drive me.
🏠 I take you to and from your house.

transport.question: I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I might take you across a big lake or ocean.
🐥 Ducks also float on the water, but I'm much bigger!
🚢 I am often big and white.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ People sit inside me to travel far away.
🛩️ I have wings but I'm not a bird!

transport.question: I go choo choo! What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on a track.
🚂 I carry lots of people or things.
💨 I make a lot of noise when I go.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have flashing lights.
🚑 I take people to the hospital.
🤒 I help make people feel better.

transport.question: I take kids to school. I am big and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 Lots of kids ride me together.
🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out so kids can cross the road safely.
🏫 I only work when kids are at school.

transport.question: I help firefighters put out fires. I am red and have a long hose. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I spray water to stop things from burning.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters drive me.
🚨 I have a loud siren so people know I am coming.

transport.question: I can fly to the moon. I am very tall and fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go up, up, up into space!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌕 I am not an airplane and I don't land on Earth.

transport.question: I take people around the city and stop often. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car but smaller than a train.
📍 I have a special route I follow.
🚦 People wait for me at bus stops.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I am fun to ride in the park.
🧑‍🦽 You need to balance so that you don't fall off.
⚙️ I require pedaling.

bug.question: I have wings and like to fly. I love to sip from flowers, what am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like sweet things.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I start as a caterpillar.

bug.question: I make honey, I live in a hive, and I can sting. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I make something yummy.
🐝 I buzz!

bug.question: I hop and jump, I am green, and I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat grass
🐸 I am not a frog, but I jump like one.
🎶 You might hear me chirping on a summer night.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry leaves. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am strong and work together.
🧺 I carry food to my home.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a web. I catch food in it. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🦟 I eat flies.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and help gardens grow. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am good luck!
⚫ I have dots on my back.
🪴 I eat tiny bugs that hurt plants.

bug.question: I fly around lights at night. I can be very annoying, what am I?

hints.text: 💡 I love bright places.
🦟 I can bite and make you itchy!
🌙 I come out when it is dark.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. I light up the garden, who am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am like a tiny star.
🔦 I can make light.
🌳 I live in the grass and trees.

bug.question: I am long and thin. I wiggle on the ground. Birds like to eat me, who am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help the soil in the ground
🐥 Birds love to eat me.
🌧️ I come out when it rains.

bug.question: I change my shape. First, I am a caterpillar, then I sleep in a chrysalis, then I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat leaves when I'm young.
😴 I take a long nap to change.
🦋 I become something beautiful.
